# init(performanceMode:)

**Initializer**

Initializes the parameters with defaults.

## Declaration

```swift
init(performanceMode: WAPerformanceMode = .bulk)
```

## Checking the configured performance mode

- **performanceMode**: The initial performance configuration of the data path when connected.

items.description: The initial performance configuration of the data path when connected.
